title: of the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939),
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Specialist Community-Based
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Specialist Community-Based 
Disability Services (Transfer of Departmental Administration and Ministerial 
Functions) Order 2022. 

(2) This Order comes into operation on 1 March 2023.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited specialist community-based disability service (transfer departmental administration ministerial functions) order 2022 (2) order come operation 1 march 2023

title: of the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939),
heading: In this Order, “relevant function” means –
text_raw:
2. 

In this Order, “relevant function” means – 

(a) 

(b) 

any function transferred by Article 4 of this Order, and 

any function transferred to the Minister for Children, Equality, 
Disability, Integration and Youth by – 

(i) 

the Health Act 2004 (No. 42 of 2004), 

(ii) 

the Disability Act 2005 (No. 14 of 2005), 

(iii) 

the Health Act 2007 (No. 23 of 2007), 

in so far only as the function consists of, or is connected with, specialist 
community-based disability services, within the meaning of the Health Act 
2004, or any such other function otherwise assigned to that Minister by any of 
those Acts.
text_norm: 2 order relevant function mean - (a) (b) function transferred article 4 order function transferred minister child equality disability integration youth - (i) health act 2004 (no 42 2004) (ii) disability act 2005 (no 14 2005) (iii) health act 2007 (no 23 2007) far function consists connected specialist community-based disability service within meaning health act 2004 function otherwise assigned minister act

title: of the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939),
heading: 3. (1) The administration and business in connection with the exercise,
text_raw:
3. (1) The administration and business in connection with the exercise, 
performance or execution of any relevant function are transferred to the 
Department of Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and Youth. 

(2) References to the Department of Health contained in any Act or any 
instrument made under such Act and relating to any administration and 
business transferred by paragraph (1) of this Article shall, on and after the 
commencement of this Order, be construed as references to the Department of 
Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and Youth.
text_norm: 3 (1) administration business connection exercise performance execution relevant function transferred department child equality disability integration youth (2) reference department health contained act instrument made act relating administration business transferred paragraph (1) article shall commencement order construed reference department child equality disability integration youth

title: of the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939),
heading: 4. (1) The functions vested in the Minister for Health -
text_raw:
4. (1) The functions vested in the Minister for Health - 

(a) 

by or under the enactment specified in Part 1 of the Schedule, 

(b) by or under the provisions of the enactments specified in Part 2 

of the Schedule, and 

(c) 

under the instrument specified Part 3 of the Schedule, 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 16th December, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [688] 3 

are transferred to the Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, Integration 
and Youth. 

(2) References to the Minister for Health contained in any Act or 
instrument made under such Act, and relating to any relevant function shall, on 
and after the commencement of this Order, be construed as references to the 
Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and Youth.

title: of the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939),
heading: 5. Where, immediately before the commencement of this Order, any legal
text_raw:
5. Where, immediately before the commencement of this Order, any legal 
proceedings are pending to which the Minister for Health is a party and the 
proceedings have reference to any relevant function of the Minister for 
Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and Youth, the name of the Minister 
for Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and Youth shall, in so far as the 
proceedings relate to any relevant function, be substituted in the proceedings 
for that of the Minister for Health or added in the proceedings, as may be 
appropriate, and the proceedings shall not abate by reason of such substitution.
text_norm: 5 immediately commencement order legal proceeding pending minister health party proceeding reference relevant function minister child equality disability integration youth name minister child equality disability integration youth shall far proceeding relate relevant function substituted proceeding minister health added proceeding may appropriate proceeding shall abate reason substitution

title: of the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939),
heading: 6. Anything commenced before the commencement of this Order by or
text_raw:
6. Anything commenced before the commencement of this Order by or 
under the authority of the Minister for Health may, in so far as it relates to any 
relevant function of the Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, Integration 
and Youth, be carried on or completed on or after such commencement by the 
Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and Youth.
text_norm: 6 anything commenced commencement order authority minister health may far relates relevant function minister child equality disability integration youth carried completed commencement minister child equality disability integration youth

title: of the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939),
heading: 7. Every document (including any certificate or licence) granted or made
text_raw:
7. Every document (including any certificate or licence) granted or made 
in the exercise of a relevant function, if and in so far as it was operative 
immediately before the commencement of this Order, has effect on and after 
such commencement as if it had been granted or made by the Minister for 
Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and Youth.
text_norm: 7 every document (including certificate licence) granted made exercise relevant function far operative immediately commencement order effect commencement granted made minister child equality disability integration youth

title: of the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939),
heading: 8. References to the Minister for Health contained in the memorandum
text_raw:
8. References to the Minister for Health contained in the memorandum 
and articles of association of any company and relating to any relevant function 
shall, on and after the commencement of this Order, be construed as references 
to the Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and Youth.
text_norm: 8 reference minister health contained memorandum article association company relating relevant function shall commencement order construed reference minister child equality disability integration youth

title: of the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939),
heading: 9. (1) All property, rights and liabilities held, enjoyed or incurred before
text_raw:
9. (1) All property, rights and liabilities held, enjoyed or incurred before 
the commencement of this Order by the Minister for Health in connection with 
any relevant function, are transferred on the commencement to the Minister for 
Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and Youth and, accordingly, without 
any further conveyance, transfer or assignment – 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

that property, both real and personal, vests in the Minister for 
Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and Youth, 

those rights are rights of the Minister for Children, Equality, 
Disability, Integration and Youth, and 

those liabilities are liabilities of the Minister for Children, 
Equality, Disability, Integration and Youth. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [688] 

(2) All moneys, stocks, shares and securities transferred to the Minister for 
Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and Youth by this Article which, on 
the commencement of this Order, are standing in the name of the Minister for 
Health shall, on the request of the Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, 
Integration and Youth, be transferred into the name of the Minister for 
Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and Youth. 

 
 
 
 SCHEDULE 

Part 1 

[688] 5 

Article 4 

Education for Persons with Special Educational Needs Act 2004 (No. 30 of 
2004) 

Part 2 

Part 2 of the Disability Act 2005 

Sections 67C and 67D of the Health Act 1970 (No. 1 of 1970) 

Part 3 

Commission of Investigation (Certain matters relative to a disability service in 
the South East and related matters) Order 2017 (S.I. No. 96 of 2017) 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 6 [688] 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

13 December, 2022. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach.
